q3.question: When council decides he does not wish to share the loot what does he do?
q3.answer: ['Plot to kill Appleyard and his convict friends']
q3.recall: When Council decides he does not wish to share the loot, he shoots Sizemore.
q3.vectordb:
When council decides he does not wish to share the loot, he guns down Steve and Junior on a Marshall County hillside and makes his way to an abandoned house. He then fires a shotgun round through an upstairs window, injuring Appleyard. Johnny and Lee prepare to throw dynamite at Council, but Council's dog, Joey, picks up the dynamite and carries it back upstairs. The dog drops the dynamite, and Appleyard throws it out the window, causing it to explode and kill Council. 
Source: k-3
q3.hybrid:
When council decides he does not wish to share the loot, he guns down Steve and Junior on a Marshall County hillside and makes his way to an abandoned house. He then fires a shotgun round through an upstairs window, injuring Appleyard. Johnny and Lee prepare to throw dynamite at Council, but Council's dog, Joey, picks up the dynamite and carries it back upstairs. The dog drops the dynamite, and Appleyard throws it out the window, causing it to explode and kill Council. 
Source: k-3
